value.name: Vigils and Demonstrations For George Floyd On 1-Year Anniversary Of His Murder By Police
value.description: As vigils and demonstrations were held nationwide on Tuesday to mark the one-year anniversary of the murder of George Floyd by Minneapolis police, his family announced a fund to help the community where he was killed.
